name: Im glad
author: HudCant5
notes: 60 wins easy KoG only two days into January. 3 flood gate was vital and so clutch against Bamboo FTK. Same goes for econ. This meta was so annoying between cyber and ninja players playing their farewell games. Everyone running cuk FTK decks. High hopes for this deck once the nerf and banlist hits. #bansprite
